ABMI camera deployments public locations

Source: R/datasets.R
public_locations.Rd

This dataset provides the lat/long coordinates associated with the public locations of ABMI camera deployments.

public_locations

Format

A data.frame with 5 columns

Deployment

The camera deployment ID. Format is <Project Code>-<Site>-<Station>, e.g. ABMI-1-NE.

NearestSite

The corresponding nearest ABMI sampling site.

Year

The year the camera was deployed.

Public_Lat

The public latitude

Public_Long

The public longitude

Source

Alberta Biodiversity Monitoring Institute

See also

https://www.abmi.ca/home/data-analytics/DA-top-about-data/About-ABMI-Data/Survey-Site-Locations.html
